title: Enchanting Emerald Cascade Jhumkas: Manoharam Patchala Jhumkalu
materials: Platinum plated base metal; studded with high-quality Cubic Zirconia and Oval cut Emerald Green hydro stones; Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine and luster.
features: Intricate filigree design inspired by traditional South Indian floral motifs, adorned with cascading teardrop Emerald green hydro stones. The elaborate setting showcases brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia, highlighting the central emerald stone. The design balances traditional charm with modern elegance, making it a truly exceptional piece.
colors: Emerald Green and Brilliant White (Cubic Zirconia)
accented by the platinum plated base for a radiant
occasions: and other traditional events. A modern touch also makes them suitable for parties and special occasions where a statement piece is desired.
description: These Jhumkas beautifully merge tradition and contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality Cubic Zirconia provides a diamond-like sparkle, while the Emerald Green hydro stones offer a vibrant and luxurious feel. The elaborate design is meticulously handcrafted, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. An excellent addition to your bridal jewelry collection or a treasured gift for a loved one. These jhumkas are a true testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship and will make you feel like royalty!
